_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_STATIC_RC6


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: November 16 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for high-detailed military/warehouse themed map [de_static_rc6](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/54178) by JamesL (created February 2007).
It's created from scratch and manually optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file ('cause original mapauthor's release was included a simple auto-gen .nav-file).

Well... bots use all possible ways now. And now in the territory of this thrown military base ruthless battles for each plot of land inflame! :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by mapauthor included in original .bsp and available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/54178).

Play and Enjoy! Also always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   JamesL / [FnB] Ruud (for very realistic and fight-friendly atmospheric military-styled map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

No one knows, friends or foes, if Valhalla lies beyond the grave! :-)
